panel.title: User Configuration Guidance
panel.html:
Number of Contestants: The maximum number of contestants expected for the competition (Maybe a few more if you think you might get some walk-ins)
Example: 25
Short Name For Competition (no spaces): This is a name of your choosing, it will be the name that becomes part of the URL
Example: FMLA (short for Field Marketing Los Angeles)
Competition Type: This will determine the image used and number of gaming servers required

search.query: | makeresults 1 | eval contestants=$num_players$, compname="$comp_short$", scoring="od-"."$comp_short$"."-scoring.splunkoxygen.com", gaming="od-"."$comp_short$"."-XX.splunkoxygen.com", comptype="$comp_type$" | table contestants compname scoring gaming comptype | usergen

p.a: OK, I'm satisfied. Make it so.
